title: promogames to silver
body: I had a game before where I was already 2 and 2 in promos to silver, we were 11,5k gold behind but somehow I managed to carry as GP quite hard it was a very long game, but I won it with a lot of effort and now after the game it still says 2 and 2 in promos I didn't get silver, it didn't change after half an hour also not after I relogged myself, even in the lobby it says that I am still in promo, although I am sure that I just finished it cause I knew that I started it with a loss, anybody help or an explanation for it ? please

replies.body: Und jetzt habe ich das 6 promospiel verloren... danke riot...
